00042                 const std::string header =      "\n"
00043                                                                         "Aeryn 2.1.1 (c) Paul Grenyer 2005\n"
00044                                                                         "http://www.aeryn.co.uk/\n";

00047                 const std::string defaultTestSetName = "";

00056                 template< class SizeT, class ValueT >
00057                 SizeT AccumTestCount
00058                 ( 
00059                         SizeT total, 
00060                         const ValueT& testSet  
00061                 )
00062                 {
00063                         return total += testSet.first.size();
00064                 }
00065         }

00068         TestRunner::IReportPtr TestRunner::CreateReport
00069         (
00070                 int argc, 
00071                 char *argv[] 
00072         )
00073         {
00074                 std::auto_ptr< IReport > report( new MinimalReport );
00075 
00076                 if ( argc == 2 )
00077                 {
00078                         if ( strcmp(argv[1], "terse" ) == 0 )
00079                         {
00080                                 report.reset( new TerseReport( std::cout ) );
00081                         }
00082                         else if ( strcmp(argv[1], "verbose" ) == 0 )
00083                         {
00084                                 report.reset( new VerboseReport );
00085                         }
00086                         else if ( strcmp(argv[1], "xcode" ) == 0 )
00087                         {
00088                                 report.reset( new XcodeReport<>( std::cout, "bin/TestPassCookie.txt" ) );
00089                         }                       
00090                         else 
00091                         {
00092                                 std::cerr << "Unrecognised command line argument '" << argv[1] << "'\n";
00093                         }
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 assert( report.get() );
00097                 return report;
00098         }

00101         TestRunner::TestRunner
00102                 () 
00103         : testSets_()
00104         {
00105                 testSets_.reserve( 10 );
00106         }

00109         void TestRunner::Add
00110         ( 
00111                 const std::string& name, 
00112                 const TestCase nullTerminatedArray[]
00113         )
00114         {
00115                 TestCaseCont testSet;
00116 
00117                 for( unsigned long i = 0; !nullTerminatedArray[i].IsNull(); ++i )
00118                 {
00119                         testSet.push_back( nullTerminatedArray[i] );
00120                 }
00121 
00122                 testSets_.push_back( TestSet( testSet, name ) );
00123         }
00124 
00126         void TestRunner::Add
00127         ( 
00128                 const TestCase nullTerminatedArray[] 
00129         )
00130         {
00131                 Add( defaultTestSetName, nullTerminatedArray );
00132         }

00135         void TestRunner::Add
00136         ( 
00137                 const std::string& name, 
00138                 const TestCase& singleTestCase          
00139         )
00140         {
00141                 TestCaseCont testSet;
00142                 testSet.push_back( singleTestCase );
00143                 testSets_.push_back( TestSet( testSet, name ) );
00144         }
00145 
00147         void TestRunner::Add
00148         ( 
00149                 const TestCase& singleTestCase 
00150         )
00151         {
00152                 Add( defaultTestSetName, singleTestCase );
00153         }

00156         int TestRunner::Run
00157                 ()
00158         {
00159                 MinimalReport report;
00160                 return Run( report );
00161         }
00162         
00164         int TestRunner::Run
00165         ( 
00166                 IReport& report
00167         )
00168         {
00169                 const unsigned long testCout    = TestCount();
00170                 unsigned long failureCount              = 0;
00171                 unsigned long missingCount              = 0;
00172                 report.BeginTesting( header, testCout );
00173 
00174                 TestSetCont::const_iterator currentTestSet      = testSets_.begin();
00175                 TestSetCont::const_iterator endTestSet          = testSets_.end();
00176 
00177                 for( ; currentTestSet != endTestSet; ++currentTestSet )
00178                 {
00179                         report.BeginTestSet( currentTestSet->second );
00180                                         
00181                         TestCaseCont::const_iterator current    = currentTestSet->first.begin();
00182                         TestCaseCont::const_iterator end                = currentTestSet->first.end();
00183 
00184                         for( ; current != end; ++current )
00185                         {
00186                                 report.BeginTest( current->Name() );
00187 
00188                                 switch( RunTest( *current, report ) )
00189                                 {
00190                                 case FAILED:
00191                                         ++failureCount;
00192                                         break;
00193 
00194                                 case PASSED:
00195                                         break;
00196 
00197                                 case MISSING:
00198                                         ++missingCount;
00199                                         break;
00200 
00201                                 default:
00202                                         assert( !"Unknown result type." );
00203                                 };                              
00204 
00205                                 report.EndTest( current->Name() );
00206                         }
00207 
00208                         report.EndTestSet( currentTestSet->second );
00209                 }
00210                 
00211                 report.EndTesting( testCout, failureCount, missingCount );
00212 
00213                 return failureCount != 0 ? -1 : 0;
00214         }
00215 
00217         unsigned long TestRunner::TestCount
00218                 () const
00219         {
00220                 return std::accumulate( testSets_.begin(), 
00221                                                                 testSets_.end(), 
00222                                                                 0, 
00223                                                                 AccumTestCount< TestCaseCont::size_type, TestSet > );           
00224         }
00225 
00227         TestRunner::Result TestRunner::RunTest
00228         (
00229                 const TestCase& test,
00230                 IReport& report 
00231         )
00232         {
00233                 Result result = FAILED;
00234                 
00235                 try
00236                 {
00237                         test.Run();
00238                         report.Pass( test.Name() );
00239                         result = PASSED;
00240                 }
00241                 catch( const TestFailure& e )
00242                 {
00243                         report.Failure( test.Name(), e );
00244                 }
00245                 catch( const TestMissing& e )
00246                 {
00247                         report.MissingTest( test.Name(), e );
00248                         result = MISSING;
00249                 }
00250                 catch( const std::exception& e )
00251                 {
00252                         report.Error( test.Name(), e.what() );
00253                 }
00254                 catch( ... )
00255                 {
00256                         report.Error( test.Name(), "!!! Unknown Error !!!" );
00257                 }       
00258 
00259                 return result;
00260         }
